Passaic.Bogota Public Schools:
The Bogota Public Schools are a comprehensive community public school district serving students in pre-kindergarten through twelfth grade from the Borough of Bogota in Bergen County, New Jersey, United States.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the district and its three schools had an enrollment of 1,174 students and 86.2 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 13.6:1.
The district is classified by the New Jersey Department of Education as being in District Factor Group "DE", the fifth-highest of eight groupings.
